Question.Subject: I want to download auto clicker for my website Do you know where can i download?
Question.Content: I want to download auto clicker for my website Do you know where can i download it and how to place it on my website for work and how does it work ?
Question.ChosenAnswer: There are a lot of autoclickers out there. They are just macros. They will record your mouse clicks and keystrokes and then repeat them. http://www.autoclickextreme.com/ind.html

Answer.Content: There are a lot of autoclickers out there. They are just macros. They will record your mouse clicks and keystrokes and then repeat them. http://www.autoclickextreme.com/ind.html
